Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class Mapping

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.Mapping
public class Mapping extends Object
This utility class supports mapping between coded values and system names in V2 and FHIR
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ORIGINAL
    constant used to store the original coding Coding.userData for mapped values
    static final String
    ORIGINAL_DISPLAY
    constant used to store the original display name in Type.userData for types with a display name
    static final String
    ORIGINAL_SYSTEM
    constant used to store the original system in Type.userData for types with a System
    static final String
    V2_TABLE_PREFIX
    The prefix for V2 tables in HL7 Terminology

  • Method Details

    • getMapping

      public static Mapping getMapping(String name)
      Get the specified mapping
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the mapping
      Returns:
      The specified mapping or null if it was not found.

    • asConceptMap

      public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.ConceptMap asConceptMap()
      Return the mapping as a concept map
      Returns:
      The concept map.

    • mapCode

      public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding mapCode(String text)
      Map a string using the to Coding map.
      Parameters:
      text - The string to map
      Returns:
      The coding or null if no match

    • mapCode

      public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding mapCode(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding, boolean useAny)
      Map a coding using the to Coding map.
      Parameters:
      coding - The coding to map
      useAny - If there is a "*" mapping, use it.
      Returns:
      The coding or null if no match, or coding cannot be mapped

    • unMapCode

      public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding unMapCode(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding, boolean useAny)
      Reverse map a coding using the to Coding map.
      Parameters:
      coding - The coding to map
      useAny - If there is a "*" mapping, use it.
      Returns:
      The coding or null if no match, or coding cannot be mapped

    • mapCode

      public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding mapCode(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept cc)
      Map a CodeableConcept using the to Coding map. returns the first match on cc.getCoding or null if nothing matches. Order in cc.getCoding is therefore important.
      Parameters:
      cc - The CodeableConcept
      Returns:
      The coding or null if no match

    • updateCodeLookup

      public static Map<String,org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding> updateCodeLookup(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding)
      Updates display name resolution table for a coding.
      Parameters:
      coding - A coding with code, display and system all populated
      Returns:
      The updated code lookup map where the given coding is stored.

    • getDisplay

      public static String getDisplay(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding)
      Given a coding with code and system set, get the associated display name for the code if known.
      Parameters:
      coding - The coding to search for.
      Returns:
      The display name for the code.

    • hasDisplay

      public static boolean hasDisplay(String code, String table)
      Indicates if a display name is known for coding with given code and table or system name
      Parameters:
      code - The code to search for.
      table - The HL7 V2 table or FHIR System uri to look for.
      Returns:
      true if a display name is know for this code and table

    • getDisplay

      public static String getDisplay(String code, String table)
      The the display name for coding with given code and table or system name
      Parameters:
      code - The code to search for.
      table - The HL7 V2 table or FHIR System uri to look for.
      Returns:
      The display name this code and table, or null if not found.

    • setDisplay

      public static void setDisplay(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding)
      Given a coding with code and system set, set the associated display name for the code if known.
      Parameters:
      coding - The coding to search for and potentially adjust. If no display name is set, then the coding is unchanged. Thus, a default display name can be provided before making this call.

    • reset

      public static void reset(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Type type)
      The converter adds some extra data that it knows about codes for better interoperability, e.g., display names, code system URLs et cetera. This may be why the strings are different. Reset those changes (the original supplied values are in user data under the string "original{FieldName}"
      Parameters:
      type - The type to reset to original values.

    • reset

      public static void reset(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding)
      Reset a Coding produced during conversion to its original, unmapped values for display and system During the conversion process, the V2 to FHIR converter will store the original values in the message in user data found in the datatypes. The reset method restores those values to the data type.
      Parameters:
      coding - A coding produced by DatatypeConverter to reset

    • reset

      public static void reset(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.CodeableConcept cc)
      Reset a CodeableConcept produced during conversion to its original, unmapped values for display and system During the conversion process, the V2 to FHIR converter will store the original values in the message in user data found in the datatypes. The reset method restores those values to the datatype.
      Parameters:
      cc - A CodeableConcept produced by DatatypeConverter to reset

    • map

      public static org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding map(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Coding coding)
      Given a coding and system, set the system and display values to expected values in FHIR.
      Parameters:
      coding - The coding to adjust
      Returns:
      The mapped coding.

    • mapSystem

      public static org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Identifier mapSystem(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Identifier ident)
      Map the V2 system value found in ident.system to the system URI expected in FHIR. If the system is changed, the original value will be stored and can later be retrieved by calling ident.getUserData(Mapping.ORIGINAL_SYSTEM)
      Parameters:
      ident - The coding to adjust the system for
      Returns:
      The updated Identifier

    • mapTableNameToSystem

      public static String mapTableNameToSystem(String value)
      Given a coding system name or URL, get the preferred CodeSystem url for FHIR.
      Parameters:
      value - A coding system name or URL
      Returns:
      The preferred name as a URL.

    • v2Table

      public static String v2Table(String table)
      Return the V2 system name for the given table
      Parameters:
      table - The table name.
      Returns:
      The normalized FHIR System Name for that table.
